scripts.predev: cargo about generate --manifest-path src-tauri/Cargo.toml src-tauri/about.hbs -o public/licenses-cargo.json && cp src-tauri/licenses-cargo.json public/licenses-cargo.json
scripts.build: tsc && vite build && cargo about generate --manifest-path src-tauri/Cargo.toml src-tauri/about.hbs -o ../dist/licenses-cargo.json
